title: Import Skill
description: Import a skill from a file or GitHub repository

github.title: Import from GitHub
github.description: Enter a GitHub URL pointing to a skill directory containing SKILL.md

hints.githubRequired: URL must be a GitHub URL (github.com)
hints.ownerRepoRequired: URL must include owner and repository: github.com/owner/repo

file.title: Upload Skill File
file.description: Drag and drop a .skill or .zip file, or click to browse.

folder.title: Upload Skill Folder
folder.description: Drag and drop a folder containing SKILL.md, or click to browse.

errors.cannotRead: Could not read the dropped item
errors.notFolder: Please drop a folder, not a file. Use the 'Upload File' tab for .skill/.zip files.
errors.noSkillMd: Folder must contain a SKILL.md file at the root level

status.skippedFiles: {{count}} file(s) skipped (unsupported types: compiled artifacts like .exe, .dll, .so)

about.title: About Skill Import
about.description: A skill can be imported from a .skill/.zip file, a folder, or a GitHub repository. The structure must contain:
about.conflictNote: If a skill with the same name already exists, you can choose to create a copy with a new name.

conflict.title: Skill Already Exists
conflict.description: A skill named {{name}} already exists (current version: v{{version}}).
conflict.question: What would you like to do?
